name: Marker Man
description:
It is a platformer game with sketch art style which follows the journey of the marker man on a paper, solving puzzles and avoiding obsticals. Join marker man on his frustrating journey of rage quits in the world of graphite, colors and crushed paper. Team:-

Hrushikesh Bhat:- Gameplay, Level arrangment, charater Animations, sounds.

Riya Sinha:- Overall Art, Level design, idea.

Syed Nouman:- Content Writing.
